                     02                       05                       04                       11                       09                       10                       12                       13                       17                                                                     09                                           Steinhardt Alumni Duo Wins Grammy                     Feb 9, 2015          NYU Steinhardt music business alumni Ian Axel (B.Mus., ’07) and Chad Vaccarino (B.Mus., ’07), the duo who comprise A Great Big World, took home Grammy awards last night in the category of Best Pop Duo/Group Performance for “Say Something” with Christina Aguilera.      Read More                 Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development |     Press Release                                  Problem FDA Inspection Findings in Trials Seldom Reflected in Medical Literature, Journalism Study Finds                     Feb 9, 2015          When the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) identifies problems in its inspections of clinical sites where biomedical research is performed on human subjects, those findings seldom are reflected in peer-reviewed literature later written about the research, according to a study by the Arthur L. Carter Journalism Institute.
